item.description: One of the biggest vendors for libraries is closing, Reading Rainbow is back with a new host, and more news for library workers.

item.description: This week's featured new books include a sapphic knight/witch fantasy, bloody dark academia, a Nigerian tale of female rage, and more.

item.title: MY LIFE WITH THE WALTER BOYS Soars in Popularity on Libby With the Release of the New Season
item.description: One of the latest shows to be adapted from a YA book series shows the influence adaptations have on books.
